item.description:
Join us for dinner and the sunset at Madison's Surf Club beach. Tom will have a grill going. Bring something to throw on the grill, a salad or side to share ... We'll relax and enjoy the sunset, then head to the Crow's Nest at The Madison Beach Hotel. (many know this as The Wharf).

Non-residents can park at the Surf Club anytime after 5:30. We'll be there unless it's raining...it's beautiful anytime.

If it's raining we'll gather at the Crow's Nest.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a blue table cloth and small hot pick cooler and a purple, green and orange marker.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Sunset on the Beach
